pullrequest.title: Building Editor: Pick wall / floor / stairs color from a pre-set list on inspector

content.raw:
I think there will be a number of pull requests about the building editor. You can start a section for them using:


```
#!markdown

1. Building editor updates
    1. Added color picker and related functions to inspector dialogs on Building Editor.
        * [Pull request #1298](#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-request/1298)
```
